# octopusdeploy_environment (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "octopusdeploy_environment" "petclinic" {
  name = "Development"
}

data "octopusdeploy_environment" "octopus_deploy" {
  id = "Environments-781"
}
```
